article.headline: Fox Nation host Tomi Lahren tells Joe Biden that he âmight as well carry a purse with that maskâ
article.body: Tomi Lahren Getty Images Be a man, Joe. Wearing a mask is for chicks! Fox Nation host Tomi Lahren apparently sees it that way, according to this tweeted response to Joe Bidenâs message Monday night urging Americans to âwear a maskâ: iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } As Lahrenâs name shot up Twitterâs TWTR trending list, the tweet was quickly ratioed (when comments outnumber retweets or likes). So, from an attention-seeking standpoint, she nailed it. But across social media Lahren was largely being judged by other standards. Donât be afraid of Covid. Donât let it dominate your life,â he wrote on Twitter.Â Trump is ânot out of the woodsâ yet, but heâll have âworld-class medical care 24/7â at the White House, the presidentâs physician, Dr. Sean Conley,Â said Monday afternoon.
